data.name: Let's Cook Together 2
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist Let's Cook Together 2


About the Game


A story-oriented co-op experience, Let's Cook Together 2 lets you explore a grim futuristic world in which anything you eat can and will be used against you.




  • Cooperate (2-4 players) to prepare different foods varying in complexity. Use various mechanics and keep honing your skills to get better with every dish.
  • Choose the right chef for the job and upgrade your cooking arsenal to make the experience your own.
  • From Italy to Japan, travel an open world onboard the Prodigy spaceship. Use the power of cooking to liberate regions and countries all around the globe.
  • Soak your teeth into a captivating story that uses food to ask deeper questions about humanity.
  • [PLANNED] Set up your own kitchen in the dedicated Level Editor.
  • [PLANNED] Have fun in Party Mode, filled with challenges and different game modes (Battle and Endless).
  • [PLANNED] Separate level layouts for 2, 3 and 4 players.


After years of drying up all of its resources by humans, the threat of mass extinction looms over Earth. As people begin to realize they have nowhere to go and hardly anything to eat, a group of selected few settle on introducing drastic measures to keep the world spinning. But it's not that simple. Embarking on a mission nobody knew existed, you suddenly find yourself leading a worldwide revolution totake the planet back from the hands of powerful zero waste maniacs – Nutri Inc. Your quest is to cook food you know will keep humanity safe and sound. Or so you hope.

data.short_description: Let's Cook Together 2 is a plot-driven co-op game. Use teamwork to fight against Nutri Inc. - a dystopian food government. Cook and serve dishes like the future depended on it. Travel across the world to make cooking meaningful again. Take back the taste.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit only
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
